updates.HtmlString: Updated marketing cards to be more accurate for set, plus set chances as 1:3 token:marketing for core sets, 2:3 for expansions, and 9:1 as of Battle for Zendikar.
Changes foils so they'll no longer output cards outside the main set.
Rebuilt main and variant cards with the cutoff at card 362/363, fixing an issue with Sol Ring showing up where it shouldn't.
Draft booster: Legends no longer appear in C/U slots, Commander deck-specific cards removed, Extended art cards removed, foil slot now always foil. Thanks, Kowaleyer!
Draft booster: Prismatic Piper etched foil will no longer appear.
